post.author: James
post.content:
Here is detail information about Job position.

We are growing company in North America and HQ is loacted in USA.
We will provide competitive salary and benefit packages with stock option.


Job Type: Full Time  
Location: Richmond Hill, ON, CANADA;  
Job Category: Computers-Software
Number Of Positions: 1  
Date Posted: Mar 25, 2004  
Company URL : www.outlooksoft.com

Please do not send your resume to company website.
It is a position in Toronto office.

Qualifications:
• Minimum 5 years experience (including Korean experience).
• B.Sc. in Computer Science or other appropriate field.
• Preference will be given to candidates with practical experience.
• Experience with Visual Basic and/or .NET technologies an asset
• Experience with SQL, OLAP, DTS an asset.
• Experience with MS office programming an asset.
• MCAD or MCSD certification an asset.
• Strong oral and written communication skills.
• Strong teamwork skills.
• Strong analytical and problem solving skills.
• Portfolio might be needed with Resume.


Please submit your resume and cover letter to  bjlim ET goodbank.com
  -> ET should be replaced with @
post.title: We would like to hire a senior VB/ VB.NET Developer.
